com.kronostudios.the_game.core

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kronostudios.the_game.core.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    gcaballe The Game class represents a whole Game. This game is played by two UserIG in a loop of turns.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(UserIG userIG1,
            UserIG userIG2)
        Game constructor for PvP mode. Assigns the parameter userIG's to userIG1 and userIG2. Then, starts the game.
        Parameters:
        userIG2 -

      • Game

        public Game(UserIG userIG2)
        Game constructor for PvE mode. Assigns the @param userIG to userIG2 and the current logged user as userIG1. Then, starts the game.
        Parameters:
        userIG2 -

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Initializes the first Turn, and draws cards for each player.

      • changeTurn

        public void changeTurn()
        This function execute the end of turn. Executes all queued up actions of the current player. Checks if the game has already finished with checkFinishGame(). Changes turns to the other player, and draws cards.
